name: Swiss Cottage
description: Experience luxury and comfort in our spacious 5-bedroom Swiss Cottage, perfect for large families or groups looking for a retreat in the heart of nature.

name: Juniper House
description: Juniper House offers a range of cozy to spacious units, ideal for a tranquil getaway amidst valley and mountain landscapes.

name: Starway Homes
description: A collection of art-inspired homes, offering comfortable and budget-friendly units, perfect for solo travelers or couples exploring the city.

name: Amaira Hotel
description: Amaira Hotel provides a variety of spacious accommodations with stunning farm and mountain views, catering to families and larger groups.
